data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Barry is very reluctant to bring on a new attorney at his practice. His ____ is ____ manage ____ aspects ____ his ____ office. He ____ not ____ sharing ____ or ____ with ____. Therefore, although it has been suggested to him many times, he has strongly resisted the advice to expand his practice.
data.partBlankContent: Barry is very reluctant to bring on a new attorney at his practice. His prefe_____ is t_ manage a__ aspects o_ his l__ office. He do__ not en___ sharing respons_______ or cre___ with oth___. Therefore, although it has been suggested to him many times, he has strongly resisted the advice to expand his practice.
data.answer: 巴里很不愿意在他的律师事务所请一位新律师。他更喜欢管理自己律师事务所的方方面面。他不喜欢与别人分担责任或荣誉。因此，尽管有人多次向他建议，但他强烈反对扩大他的实践。
